name: Riot of the Trash Monsters
description:
This small horror game was made with https://everrethamilton.itch.io/

The object of the game is to go and search trash cans so you can build a weapon to get rid of all these creepy monsters.

Once you open the trashcan click to destroy the rubbish and search.

If you love those old 90s horror movies like gremlins then you are in for a real treat
